Html:
Hi.

I have added an image to an overlay and added it to the map.

When I zoom with the wheel all works well until the mouse is over the image, the zoom and pan functions stop.

Is the a setting to allow zooming/panning while the mouse is over the image.

Thanks

Richard

Thanks Radioman

Works great on the zoom, is there a setting for the pan, I see the mouse changes from a 4 arrow icon to the default mouse icon.

Richard
